name: 鍾仁傑
objective:
配合化學課程之進展，教導學生學習各項基本實驗操作及儀器設備之技巧，進行各項實驗課程，以訓練學生養成手腦並用的務實科學素養。
Following the progress of the course of chemistry, introduce chemical engineering students to learn basically operations and techniques for several kinds of devices in the laboratory experiments. This course is designed to train students how to use their brain and hands simultaneously and to settle down their science concepts.

scorePolicy:
1、期末考佔 20%、平常表現佔 40%、報告佔 40%。  
2、遲到每一次扣平常表現分數 2 分、每次曠課扣平常表現分數 10 分。 
3、每次發言加平常表現分數 1 分。
